704534f-a.text:
Fulton Street, at the N. E. corner of South Portland Avenue, seen from underneath the B. M. T. Fulton Street "El." The houses on the left are on South Portland Avenue.
June 15, 1940
P. L. Sperr
704534f-a.folder: Fulton Street & Portland Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

706831f-a.text:
South Portland Ave., n.e. cor. & Fulton St., B'klyn.
May 13, 1942
P.L. Sperr, photographer
Neg. #1617
706831f-a.folder: Portland Avenue S.) & Fulton Street, Brooklyn, NY
706831f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: Portland Avenue S.) - Fulton Street
